name: Config 2022 - What I did as an in-house designer to work smoothly with non-designers
description:
These are the slides for my Config 2022 talk about ‘What I did as an in-house designer to work smoothly with non-designers'. I hope you’ll enjoy the presentation even though it is in Japanese and the rest of Config 2022!


If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me anytime via Linkedin or Twitter!


Thank you.
